-1.title: Final Delivery
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Ali Kemp
1.plot: Ali Kemp, a beautiful 19-year-old college student with a bright future, returns home for the summer to work at the local swimming pool. But one afternoon when Ali is nowhere to be found, her father makes a gruesome discovery; Ali's body in the pool pump room - she'd been brutally beaten to death. With her killer on the loose, investigators launch an intense investigation. But despite DNA evidence and a reliable witness, police search without success for three years. Then refusing to give up, Ali's father comes up with an idea that leads to her killer's arrest.

2.title: Checkmate
2.plot: The town of Upper Merion is shaken when Ellen Robb is found brutally murdered in her own kitchen. At first glance, police suspect a robbery gone wrong. But as the investigation continues police uncover a secret that leads to an unlikely suspect.

3.title: Closing Time
3.plot: When Jerry Monroe is discovered murdered in his own bar, it's anybody's guess of who could be responsible. Was he the victim of a random robbery, or a motivated murder? Police examine every possible scenario until they receive a promising tip.

4.title: Cold As Ice
4.plot: California grad-student Denise Huber was on her way home from a rock concert when a flat tire forced her off the freeway and into the path of a crazed killer. Three years after she vanished Denise's remains are uncovered in a chilling discovery.

5.title: Sophia Martinez
5.plot: The night 18 year old El Paso teenager Sophia Martinez vanished, she was supposed to be going on a blind date. Days later, Sophia's body and her car are found in the desert. Police are baffled by the murder, until an ATM receipt leads to the killer.

6.title: A Mother's Love
6.plot: Debi Whitlock had it all - a career and family. But the night a killer invaded her Modesto, CA home, all of Debi's dreams died with her. It took years to find the killer - and her mother, Jacque, led the way in uncovering the truth.

7.title: In the Name of Love
7.plot: When a young mother-to-be becomes the victim of a violent death, Mississippi investigators quickly cast their suspicions on the woman's fiancé. The well-liked teacher and basketball coach may have something to hide but is he a cold-blooded killer?

8.title: Bad Karma
8.plot: Michael Dojaquez, a yoga instructor in Tucson, is found shot dead on his front porch. The crime scene suggests a robbery gone bad. But the investigation reveals a web of deception and infidelity that shocks the residents of the city

9.title: Mortal Sin
9.plot: Michael Dojaquez was a popular yoga instructor in the city of Tucson. The residents of the city are shocked with the news when he is found dead on his front porch. Detective Jimenez of the Tucson Police Department investigates what seems to be a robbery gone bad. Was it a case of being in the wrong place at the wrong time for the beloved yogi or did the killer stage the crime scene to look like a robbery? The investigation unravels an intriguing tale of deception and infidelity that scandalizes the people of Tucson.

10.title: Killer Instinct
10.plot: As a high school senior in the small town of Conway, South Carolina, 17-year-old Crystal Faye Todd can't wait for the endless possibility that awaits her at graduation. But when she doesn't return home after going out with friends one Saturday night, a gruesome discovery reveals that Crystal has been brutally murdered. As investigators deduce that she must have known her killer, a wave of fear paralyzes the community. In a town where everybody knows everybody, anyone could be a suspect ... and anyone could be next. An extensive investigation ensues, until DNA testing ...

11.title: Sudden Death
11.plot: John Cataneo has the life he has always longed for in Holly Hill, Florida. But on an otherwise ordinary night, John's life comes to a violent end. As investigators close in, family and friends are shocked to discover the real mastermind behind his death.

12.title: Til Death Do Us Part
12.plot: Dawn Hacheney marries Nick who becomes a minister at a local church. Their life seems perfect until Dawn falls victim to a house fire. A church member harbors a deadly secret, and the town is shocked when the truth about Dawn's death is exposed.

1.title: Night Angel
1.plot: Rochelle Anderson, a 25-year-old single mother, is found beaten at the gas station where she works. Police wonder who could harm such a fun and friendly woman. Was it for love, for money, or just plain evil?

2.title: Lethal Liason
2.plot: A San Diego family is in shock when their 22-year old daughter and her baby are found strangled in her apartment. The horrible nature of this crime makes investigators and the community wonder - what animal would kill a mom and her baby?

3.title: The Mask
3.plot: When a small town woman goes missing one night, people in her community are baffled. The case goes cold soon after her body is discovered. Little do police know, the identity of Lisa's killer is right under her fingertips.

4.title: (In)Security
4.plot: Bryan Ruff was a young father and security guard from Salt Lake City. In December 1991, he mysteriously disappeared and his body was later found. 15 years later, there was a break in the case which led police to discover who killed Bryan.

5.title: Missing Mother's Day
5.plot: A woman in reported missing in a small town in the Georgia countryside. There were a lot of questions and not a lot of answers. In small towns, everyone knows everyone else's secrets - but in this small town, this secret stays buried for far too long.

6.title: Hunting Season
6.plot: Lynn Orrand is a happy husband, brother and father. He and his twin brother Glenn grow up together, inseparable. Even as adults, their families grow up together. But in January of 1982, Lynn goes hunting and doesn't come back. Lynn's family is devastated and his brother swears revenge. The best the police can theorize is that it's a hunting accident and the guilty party is not coming forth. The case goes cold for 25 years, but once new evidence comes to light, there are new fingers being pointed at old friends.

7.title: A Walk in the Park
7.plot: Jeanette Kirby is brutally stabbed to death on an afternoon walk in the park. Two days later, a second body is found in the very same park. The murders send shockwaves through the small, close-knit community and leave police searching for a killer.

8.title: Written in Blood
8.plot: Happily married and expecting their first child, life couldn't be sweeter for 25-year-old Nancy Bishop and her husband. Then they are both brutally gunned down in what looks to be a professional execution. Was this young couple assassinated or was the reason for their deaths much more sinister?

9.title: Recipe for Murder
9.plot: Kim Dunkin's body is found in her car on New Year's Day, 1993. The scene leaves police with little to go on. After years of leads that go nowhere, authorities finally find their man - working a most unlikely profession.

10.title: Steven Wood
10.plot: A beloved teacher and outdoorsman in Yucaipa, CA goes missing. When his truck is found abandoned on the side of the road, rumors surface about a man suffering from depression who might have fallen victim to a satanic cult.

11.title: Twisted Love
11.plot: A pretty girl-next-door named Laura Salmon, who always had a kind word and a smile, is found dead in a field up near the quarry. Her murder was unsolved for 16 years until two detectives refused to leave any stone unturned.

12.title: Fatal Crossroads
12.plot: After 42 years of work with Boeing, Ron Whitehead's cruise control to retirement is cut short. When his body is found dead at an intersection, his family is in utter shock and what appears to be a car jacking gone wrong, is by no means, an accident.

13.title: Man Down
13.plot: When a volunteer firefighter and police officer fails to call his mother on her birthday, his family knows something is wrong. A search for his killer leads police to wonder whether if he could have been killed by friendly fire.

14.title: River of Death
14.plot: In 1996, Lisa Allison, 21, left her parent's home for the last time. The young Texas woman took Dad's car to a car wash. Witnesses saw her with an unknown man and they then drove off. No one was alarmed, as they looked like a couple. It turns out, someone should have been.

15.title: With a Friend Like This
15.plot: 20-year-old Cathy Tameny is a single parent who works hard to provide for her young son. When Cathy is found strangled in her Anaheim apartment police are baffled, but 20 years and 2,000 miles can't hide her killer.

16.title: Hook, Line and Sinker
16.plot: After a night out with friends, Teresa Comfort's body is found in her car submerged in a lake. Investigators suspect Teresa's boyfriend, but his alibi checks out. Then an unexpected tip comes in, leading them to her murderer.

17.title: Deadly Harvest
17.plot: When highschool sweethearts disappear after attending a wedding, most people think they've eloped. But as time passes with no sign of the teens, their families begin to worry that the couple has met a more sinister fate.

18.title: Caught on Tape
18.plot: Tosha Lampkin leaves her motel and never returns. Her rental car is found burning on a rural road and firefighters discover her body in the trunk. Investigators hope an image caught on the motel surveillance camera will lead them to Tosha's killer.

19.title: One Last Ride
19.plot: A hardworking young father in Salt Lake City goes missing. His wife can't help wondering if all the newfound responsibilities have become too great for him. But when his body is found in the desert sand, police know he never left his family by choice.

20.title: Silent Vow
20.plot: Tina Morton Clegg is working for a Portland non-profit when two men walk into her office and murder her in cold blood. Oregon police launch an investigation that leads them down into a labyrinth of bold lies, family ties, and scorned lovers.

21.title: New Year's Eve Murder
21.plot: A young wife with children is looking forward to a New Years eve event, she and here husband had been invited to. But her husband was having trouble with a bad back. He told her to go, and he would watch the kids. When she doesn't come home on time, he waits for her come home, all night. When she doesn't he notifies the authorities. At around the same time a body is found in a car. A lot of time is devoted to finding her killer. Much later they get a lead from the FBI about a criminal they have in custody looking for a break.

22.title: Blind Faith
22.plot: When a minister is attacked in his home, his family wonders who could take from someone who gives freely. But when the minister dies from his injuries, investigators know that while forgiveness may be divine, justice must be served.

23.title: Out of the Ashes
23.plot: Lula Young, from Mississippi, was diagnosed with cancer and everyone in town is sure she will beat the disease. Suddenly, Lula dies in a fire that engulfs her home. Police soon find out that not everyone loved Lula as much as they said they did.

24.title: Night Shift Nightmare
24.plot: Rochelle Anderson, a 25-year-old single mother, is found beaten at the gas station where she works. Police wonder who could harm such a fun and friendly woman. Was it for love, for money, or just plain evil?

25.title: Morning Ambush
25.plot: Robert Taylor's life is cut short when he is gunned down on his way to work. As years pass, family and friends wonder if they will ever find out who killed Robert until a guilty conscious drives his killer to make a shocking confession.

26.title: Only the Good Die Young
26.plot: After a long weekend, college student Kate Johnson is found lying dead on her dorm room floor. The Portland college community is shaken by this senseless murder, but police leave no stone unturned until they find the killer.

1.title: Perfect Storm
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Stolen Voices, Buried Secrets
plot: Documentary series covering murders, narrated by the murdered party.
